fields.message:
Question 1 - Signage

Is it easy to find your way around?

fields.label: Good signage should stand out well in its setting
fields.name: signage_1

fields.label: Good signage should be easily visible, not too high or low
fields.name: signage_2

fields.label: Good signage should not be refective
fields.name: signage_3

fields.label: Good signage should have an understandable picture as well as words
fields.name: signage_4

fields.label: Good signage should have both picture and words that contrast well with the background
fields.name: signage_5

fields.label: There should be clear signs to show restricted areas
fields.name: signage_6

fields.label: There should be clear signs to show fire routes and exits
fields.name: signage_7

fields.label: There should be clear signs to show how to open doors (pull/ push/ automatic)
fields.name: signage_8

fields.label: There should be clear signs to show the way out
fields.name: signage_9

fields.label: There should be clear signs to easily find someone official who can help (wearing badge / uniform?)
fields.name: signage_10

fields.message:
Question 2 - Toilets

Is it easy to find and use a toilet?

fields.label: Would you have to find a caf√© or shop if you needed a toilet?
fields.name: toilets_1

fields.label: Clear signs to a toilet should stand out well in their setting
fields.name: toilets_2

fields.label: Clear signs to a toilet should be at a height that is easily visible for all
fields.name: toilets_3

fields.label: Clear signs to a toilet should be easy to read
fields.name: toilets_4

fields.label: Clear signs to a toilet should have an understandable picture as well as words
fields.name: toilets_5

fields.label: Clear signs to a toilet should have picture and words which contrast well with the background
fields.name: toilets_6

fields.label: Does the toilet pan against the floor have good contrast?
fields.name: toilets_7

fields.label: Does the toilet seat against the pan have good contrast?
fields.name: toilets_8

fields.label: Does the wash hand basin against the wall have good contrast?
fields.name: toilets_9

fields.label: Do any grab rails against the wall have good contrast?
fields.name: toilets_10

fields.label: Does the soap dispenser against the wall have good contrast?
fields.name: toilets_11

fields.label: Does the towel dispenser against the wall have good contrast?
fields.name: toilets_12

fields.message:
Question 3 - Flooring

Does the surface cause any problems?

fields.label: There should not be too much change in tone in adjoining flooring
fields.name: flooring_1

fields.label: Flooring patterns or joints should not be too obvious
fields.name: flooring_2

fields.label: Paving repairs should not be too obvious
fields.name: flooring_3

fields.label: Paving should be non-slip and have an even surface
fields.name: flooring_3

fields.label: There should not be any tricky slopes
fields.name: flooring_4

fields.message:
Question 4 - Ambience

Is the place calm or confusing?

fields.label: Sign posts should not block your way
fields.name: ambience_1

fields.label: Lamp posts should not block your way
fields.name: ambience_2

fields.label: Litter bins should not block your way
fields.name: ambience_3

fields.label: Caf√© pavement boards should not block your way
fields.name: ambience_4

fields.label: There are not too many distractions, which can make it hard to find your way
fields.name: ambience_5

fields.label: Is there distracting music coming out of shops?
fields.name: ambience_6

fields.label: Is there very heavy traffic nearby?
fields.name: ambience_7
